context.p: To request a MiramoEnterprise license for the Miramo server, email support@datazone.com with the server information displayed by the ’mmhostid’ command: we will then email back a license key which may be applied via the ’mmVisor’ Help->Apply license key menu.

ol.li:
Run mmhostid
Once MiramoEnterprise is installed, log in as a user with Administrator privileges, start a console or powershell window and run the following command:
mmhostid hostid.txt
This will place hostid information into a file named ’hostid.txt’.

Email 'hostid.txt' to support@datazone.com
Next, email the ’hostid.txt’ file created in step 1 to support@datazone.com. We will email back a license information sheet containing a license key and instructions for applying the license.

li.p: Run mmVisor as Administrator and apply license
Right-click on the mmVisor icon an select ’Run As Administrator’ to start mmVisor in admin mode (necessary to apply the license key).
Select Help->Apply license key from the main mmVisor menu.
If mmServer is running, you will be prompted to stop mmServer before applying the license key: click Yes to proceed.
When prompted to enter license key, copy and paste the license key provided by email into the dialog box, and click ’OK’:
When prompted, click on ’Yes’ to start mmServer with the new license:
